about_the_game:
Summer Outfit pack 2 of 2.

Outfits included:

Perry: Shark World Visitor
American Dave/Canadian Dave: Sexy Lifeguard
Cady: Nurse Shark
Ein Mozart Nixon: Lobster
Jack: Tiger Shark
Kirk: Great White Shark
Morris: Angler Fish
Ogid New: Great Hammerhead Shark
Phaze: Megalodon
Thatcher: Zebra Shark

Plus 4 alt-outfits for the secret party members.

To switch outfits:


- Go to the specified characters room on your ship
- Select the Switch Outfits options
- Click on Summer
- Click on Shark Week

To switch outfits:
